channel.title: environment on CRIB artemis
channel.description: Recent content in environment on CRIB artemis

item.title: Requirements
item.description: The following machines have been tested for operation. Almalinux 9.2 zsh 5.8 gcc 11.3.1 cmake 3.20.2 ROOT 6.28/04 yaml-cpp 0.7.0 Scripts for some automate operation are written in zsh format. As for the Ubuntu 22.04 (LTS), there appeared to be a linking problem and a dummy file had to be set up to force the link.
